About the Company: Tourism Finance Corporation of India (TFCI) is engaged in the business of providing financial assistance to tourism-related activities/projects. The aim behind formation of this company was to promote a separate All-India Financial Institution for supporting tourism-linked projects. TFCI provides financial assistance in form such as Rupee Loan, Underwriting of public issues of shares/debentures and direct subscription to such securities, guarantee of deferred payments and credit raised abroad, equipment finance etc.
